title: Cognitive Load Monitoring-Based Effective Video Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental cognitive load theory and video-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Exploration of instructional design methods to enhance learning efficiency in offline environments using smartphones and simple eye-tracking tools.

learning_goals: Learners can identify optimal learning segments by monitoring cognitive load levels in real-time for specific sections of video lectures
Learners can classify at least three cognitive load patterns based on learners' prior knowledge and task complexity
Learners can propose task difficulty adjustment strategies by applying cognitive load theory when designing video lectures

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
